name: 2 Tasty
summary:
Grab a spoonful of excitement in 2 Tasty, and experience one part cooking to two parts romance in a fantastic blend of fun!

Enjoy romance with a dash of Hidden Object and Time Management fun.
Help Libby discover the recipe for success in work and love.
Search for ingredients to dice up greens, bake buns and cook tasty cakes.
Play 50 levels with up to four multiple search screens.
Unlock tasty recipes and use them in your own kitchen.

name: 2 Tasty too
summary:
Enjoy a fantastic blend of hidden object and time management romance
search for ingredients to cook Italian, Japanese, Vegetarian, and more meals
play extra mini-games and earn rewarding trophies
discover tasty recipes and use them in your own kitchen

name: 2 Times Circles
summary: 2 Times Circles is a game about controlling 2 circles moving horizontally and vertically in the two split screen at the same time.

name: 2-taku de Bishoujo Game
summary:
A quiz game that advances the story with 2 choices!
If you make a mistake, you will end up with a bad end, so be careful!

name: 2Tinycowboys
summary: 2Tinycowboys is an action-packed western-themed arcade multi-scrolling platformer in 2D, with huge variety, in which you take the role of one of 9 different cowboys, each with his/her own play-style. It has up to 4 players split-screen multiplayer available and quirky game-play and characters.

name: 2-taku de Dasshutsu Game
summary:
A quiz game where you can advance the story with two choices!
If you make a mistake, you will end up with a bad end, so be careful!

name: 2Tax Gold
summary: 2Tax Gold is a trivia game, developed by Atelier Double and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1997.
